Name: azure_applicationgatewaytotaltime_average;azure_applicationgatewaytotaltime_count;azure_applicationgatewaytotaltime_maximum;azure_applicationgatewaytotaltime_minimum;azure_applicationgatewaytotaltime_total
Description: Time that it takes for a request to be processed and its response to be sent. This is the interval from the time when Application Gateway receives the first byte of an HTTP request to the time when the response send operation finishes. It's important to note that this usually includes the Application Gateway processing time, time that the request and response packets are traveling over the network and the time the backend server took to respond.

Name: azure_avgrequestcountperhealthyhost_average;azure_avgrequestcountperhealthyhost_count;azure_avgrequestcountperhealthyhost_maximum;azure_avgrequestcountperhealthyhost_minimum;azure_avgrequestcountperhealthyhost_total
Description: Average request count per minute per healthy backend host in a pool

Description: Matched Bot Rules

Name: azure_azwafcustomrule_average;azure_azwafcustomrule_count;azure_azwafcustomrule_maximum;azure_azwafcustomrule_minimum;azure_azwafcustomrule_total
Description: Matched Custom Rules

Name: azure_azwafsecrule_average;azure_azwafsecrule_count;azure_azwafsecrule_maximum;azure_azwafsecrule_minimum;azure_azwafsecrule_total
Description: Matched Managed Rules

Name: azure_azwaftotalrequests_average;azure_azwaftotalrequests_count;azure_azwaftotalrequests_maximum;azure_azwaftotalrequests_minimum;azure_azwaftotalrequests_total
Description: Total number of requests evaluated by WAF

Name: azure_backendconnecttime_average;azure_backendconnecttime_count;azure_backendconnecttime_maximum;azure_backendconnecttime_minimum;azure_backendconnecttime_total
Description: Time spent establishing a connection with a backend server

Name: azure_backendfirstbyteresponsetime_average;azure_backendfirstbyteresponsetime_count;azure_backendfirstbyteresponsetime_maximum;azure_backendfirstbyteresponsetime_minimum;azure_backendfirstbyteresponsetime_total
Description: Time interval between start of establishing a connection to backend server and receiving the first byte of the response header, approximating processing time of backend server

Name: azure_backendlastbyteresponsetime_average;azure_backendlastbyteresponsetime_count;azure_backendlastbyteresponsetime_maximum;azure_backendlastbyteresponsetime_minimum;azure_backendlastbyteresponsetime_total
Description: Time interval between start of establishing a connection to backend server and receiving the last byte of the response body

Name: azure_backendresponsestatus_average;azure_backendresponsestatus_count;azure_backendresponsestatus_maximum;azure_backendresponsestatus_minimum;azure_backendresponsestatus_total
Description: The number of HTTP response codes generated by the backend members. This does not include any response codes generated by the Application Gateway.

Name: azure_blockedcount_average;azure_blockedcount_count;azure_blockedcount_maximum;azure_blockedcount_minimum;azure_blockedcount_total
Description: Web Application Firewall blocked requests rule distribution

Name: azure_bytesreceived_average;azure_bytesreceived_count;azure_bytesreceived_maximum;azure_bytesreceived_minimum;azure_bytesreceived_total
Description: The total number of bytes received by the Application Gateway from the clients

Name: azure_bytessent_average;azure_bytessent_count;azure_bytessent_maximum;azure_bytessent_minimum;azure_bytessent_total
Description: The total number of bytes sent by the Application Gateway to the clients

Name: azure_capacityunits_average;azure_capacityunits_count;azure_capacityunits_maximum;azure_capacityunits_minimum;azure_capacityunits_total
Description: Capacity Units consumed

Name: azure_clientrtt_average;azure_clientrtt_count;azure_clientrtt_maximum;azure_clientrtt_minimum;azure_clientrtt_total
Description: Round trip time between clients and Application Gateway. This metric indicates how long it takes to establish connections and return acknowledgements

Name: azure_computeunits_average;azure_computeunits_count;azure_computeunits_maximum;azure_computeunits_minimum;azure_computeunits_total
Description: Compute Units consumed

Name: azure_cpuutilization_average;azure_cpuutilization_count;azure_cpuutilization_maximum;azure_cpuutilization_minimum;azure_cpuutilization_total
Description: Current CPU utilization of the Application Gateway

Name: azure_currentconnections_average;azure_currentconnections_count;azure_currentconnections_maximum;azure_currentconnections_minimum;azure_currentconnections_total
Description: Count of current connections established with Application Gateway

Name: azure_estimatedbilledcapacityunits_average;azure_estimatedbilledcapacityunits_count;azure_estimatedbilledcapacityunits_maximum;azure_estimatedbilledcapacityunits_minimum;azure_estimatedbilledcapacityunits_total
Description: Estimated capacity units that will be charged

Name: azure_failedrequests_average;azure_failedrequests_count;azure_failedrequests_maximum;azure_failedrequests_minimum;azure_failedrequests_total
Description: Count of failed requests that Application Gateway has served

Description: Minimum capacity units that will be charged

Description: Number of healthy backend hosts

Name: azure_matchedcount_average;azure_matchedcount_count;azure_matchedcount_maximum;azure_matchedcount_minimum;azure_matchedcount_total
Description: Web Application Firewall Total Rule Distribution for the incoming traffic

Name: azure_newconnectionspersecond_average;azure_newconnectionspersecond_count;azure_newconnectionspersecond_maximum;azure_newconnectionspersecond_minimum;azure_newconnectionspersecond_total
Description: New connections per second established with Application Gateway

Description: Http response status returned by Application Gateway

Name: azure_throughput_average;azure_throughput_count;azure_throughput_maximum;azure_throughput_minimum;azure_throughput_total
Description: Number of bytes per second the Application Gateway has served

Name: azure_tlsprotocol_average;azure_tlsprotocol_count;azure_tlsprotocol_maximum;azure_tlsprotocol_minimum;azure_tlsprotocol_total
Description: The number of TLS and non-TLS requests initiated by the client that established connection with the Application Gateway. To view TLS protocol distribution, filter by the dimension TLS Protocol.

Description: Count of successful requests that Application Gateway has served

Description: Number of unhealthy backend hosts
